activities:
Okta is an on-demand identity and access management service that enables enterprises to accelerate the secure adoption of their web applications, both in the cloud and behind the firewall.

Okta's Service provides single sign-on for it's customer's employees to their third party applications. To provide the Service, Okta requires personal information in the form of usernames and passwords. All personal information submitted to the Service is highly secure and encrypted. As part of our commitment to security, Okta conducts a SOC 2 audit annually to verify the design and operating effectiveness of the security processes for our service and our company. The detailed results of this stringent process are available upon request by contacting security@okta.com.

Okta also collects personal information of visitors to Okta's website in the form of contact information provided by such visitors when requesting additional information about Okta's Service as well as information collected automatically, such as IP addresses, and through cookies, web beacons and third party tracking . Okta may use the collected Personal Information and other information Okta collects about the use of the Service to operate and make the Service available; for billing, identification and authentication; to send updates about our company and our products; to contact about the use of the Service; for research purposes, and to generally improve the content and functionality of the Service and Web site.

Okta may also transmit or share Personal Information with its third party vendors and hosting partners to provide the necessary hardware, software, networking, storage, and other technology and services required to operate and maintain the Service, which may require that Personal Information be transferred from your current location to the offices and servers of Okta and the authorized third parties referred to in this paragraph. Okta’s agents and service providers do not have any right to use Personal Information we share with them beyond what is necessary to assist us.
